synthesis_method: The synthesis process involves weighing anhydrous YCl, LiCl, and YF3 in a molar ratio of 0.9:3:0.1, respectively, mixing them uniformly, heating the mixture to 520Â°C under vacuum for 12 hours, conducting solid phase sintering, cooling, and finally grinding and crushing to obtain the F-Anion doped Li3YCl5.7F0.3 solid electrolyte material.
